
############################## Experiment details ##############################

num_rounds: 30
eval_every: 10

client_types: [(<class 'rayleaf.entities.client.Client'>, 20)]

client_lr: 0.05
batch_size: 64
seed: 0
use_val_set: False
num_epochs: 10
gpus_per_client_cluster: 1
num_client_clusters: 4
